#{orderId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select eo.*, ed.*, e.area_name prov_text, e1.area_name city_text, e2.area_name dist_text from eb_order eo, eb_order_detail ed, eb_area e, eb_area e1, eb_area e2 where eo.order_id = ed.order_id and eo.province = e.area_id and eo.city = e1.area_id and eo.district = e2.area_id and eo.order_id = #{orderId}
